claim_card.claim: Before major crises, expected signatures include: (i) J rises then flattens near J*, (ii) diffusion declines under record ‘efficiency’, and (iii) core–edge divergence increases toward Γcrit.
claim_card.test_hook: Event studies on 1929, dot-com, 2008, 2020: test whether the triad appears consistently and adds predictive power vs standard indicators.
